```
rm(list=ls())
mulai = Sys.time()

n = 10^6
a = 1
b = 2
h = (b-a)/n
x = seq(a,b,h)

f = function(x)x^2

y = sapply(x,f)
int = mean(y)

print(paste0("Integral f(x) dx adalah: ",int))
print(Sys.time()-mulai)
```


```
function result = midpoint_double1(f, a, b, c, d, nx, ny)
    hx = (b - a)/nx;
    hy = (d - c)/ny;
    I = 0;
    for i = 0:(nx-1)
        for j = 0:(ny-1)
            xi = a + hx/2 + i*hx;
            yj = c + hy/2 + j*hy;
            I = I + hx*hy*f(xi, yj);
        end
    end
    result = I;
end

>> f = @(x, y) 2*x + y;
>>> midpoint_double1(f, 0, 2, 2, 3, 5, 5)
9.0

```
